## Completed

- Implemented the chunking algorithm with overlap support.
- Added cosine similarity utility function.
- Wrote unit tests for internal.py.

## Decisions

- Chunk size defaults to 512 tokens with 64-token overlap.
- Hash uses SHA-256 over UTF-8 encoded text.

## Next Steps

- Implement hybrid search combining BM25 and vector scores.
- Add MMR re-ranking to reduce redundant results.
- Wire up the CLI with typer.
